visits.text: Discovery of Brno's historic center: Saint Peter and Paul Cathedral, Špilberk Castle, Freedom Square.
Strolling in Lužánky park, the oldest in the Czech Republic.
Discovery of the historic center of Brno, capital of Moravia
Visit to Špilberk castle on the heights of Brno
Discovery of the Cathedral of Saint Peter and Saint Paul

activities.text: Discovery of the markets and modern galleries of the city center.
Strolling through the streets and squares of Brno to enjoy the local atmosphere

activities.text: Urban stroll to discover the monuments and institutions of the city

visits.text: Exploration of the Bohemian Paradise (Český ráj) and its rock landscapes
Discovery of the Hruboskalsko rock site and its sandstone towers
Viewpoint over the rock formations and forests of the Bohemian Paradise

activities.text: Hiking in the rock towns of the Bohemian Paradise

days_plan.itin_title: THE MOST BEAUTIFUL PLACES IN THE CZECH REPUBLIC

visits.text: Visit to the Punkva caves in the Moravian Karst
Discovery of stalactites, stalagmites and underground gorges
Visit to Masaryk Cave, one of the most beautiful on the site

activities.text: Guided walking tour in the Punkva caves
Boat ride on the underground river of the Punkva caves

visits.text: Discovery of the historic center of Karlovy Vary
Stroll along the thermal colonnades of Karlovy Vary
Discovery of churches and buildings from the late 19th century

activities.text: Relaxation in the spas of Karlovy Vary
Participation in cultural events or festivals according to the season

days_plan.itin_title: THE MOST BEAUTIFUL PLACES IN THE CZECH REPUBLIC

visits.text: Discovery of Karlštejn village at the foot of the castle
Visit of Karlštejn Castle, former royal residence and stronghold of the crown jewels
Discovery of the Chapel of the Holy Cross and the paintings of Theodoric

activities.text: Guided tour of the five floors of the imperial palace of Karlštejn Castle

days_plan.itin_title: THE MOST BEAUTIFUL PLACES IN THE CZECH REPUBLIC

visits.text: Visit of Konopiště Castle, former Gothic fortress turned aristocratic residence
Discovery of the rose gardens, lake and park around Konopiště Castle

activities.text: Tour of Archduke Franz Ferdinand's private apartments
Walk in Konopiště park between the lake and the free-roaming peacocks

days_plan.itin_title: THE MOST BEAUTIFUL PLACES IN THE CZECH REPUBLIC

visits.text: Discovery of the medieval historic center of Kutná Hora, former silver mining town
Visit to Saint Barbara's Church, Gothic masterpiece listed by UNESCO
Discovery of the Sedlec Ossuary and its bone decorations
Visit to the Jesuit College, now a modern art museum

activities.text: Walking tour between the various monuments listed as UNESCO World Heritage sites

days_plan.itin_title: THE MOST BEAUTIFUL PLACES IN THE CZECH REPUBLIC

visits.text: Stop in Svijany to discover the historic brewery founded in the 16th century.
Walk around Lake Svijany, a swimming and relaxation spot popular with locals.
Discovery of Liberec's city center: neo-Renaissance town hall, regional museum and Ještěd hill.

activities.text: End of the tour with a panorama over the Jizera Mountains from the Ještěd television tower.

days_plan.itin_title: FROM MORAVIA TO THE TREASURES OF PRAGUE AND THE CZECH PARADISE

visits.text: Visit to the town of Mikulov, ideal base for the South Moravian wine route
Discovery of the Pálava hills along the wine route
View of the Nové Mlýny reservoir

activities.text: Walking or cycling tour on the Mikulov wine route
Moravian wine tasting in the Mikulov region

days_plan.itin_title: THE MOST BEAUTIFUL PLACES IN THE CZECH REPUBLIC

visits.text: Discovery of Krkonoše National Park and its alpine landscapes
Ascent of Mount Sněžka, highest peak of the Czech Republic

Hiking on foot on the marked trails of Krkonoše National Park

days_plan.itin_title: THE MOST BEAUTIFUL PLACES IN THE CZECH REPUBLIC

visits.text: Hike in the natural site of Prachovské Skaly, spectacular rock formations of the Bohemian Paradise.

activities.text: Observation of local wildlife and exploration of the park's panoramic trails.

activities.text: Cruise on the Vltava at sunset or visit to a themed museum depending on available time.

activities.text: Walk around the lakes and pastel facades of the historic center.

visits.text: Discovery of the baroque castle of Valtice, UNESCO World Heritage listed.
Walk in the vast landscape park of the Lednice estate, its greenhouses and romantic minaret.

days_plan.itin_title: FROM MORAVIA TO THE TREASURES OF PRAGUE AND THE CZECH PARADISE

visits.text: Climbing the observation tower of Velké Pavlovice offering a panoramic view of the Moravian vineyards.

activities.text: Free tasting of local wines in the village cellars, the country's most renowned wine region.
